exclusion:
1. Bring the Sensor within 3 feet of your Z-Wave hub
  2. Put your Z-Wave hub into exclusion mode (see your controller's manual for details, as each brand is different)
  3. Click the Z-Wave button 3 times quickly (button inside cover by battery)
  4. Your hub should confirm exclusion and the sensor will disappear from the interface
inclusion:
1. Put the Z-Wave hub into inclusion/pairing mode (see your hub's manual for instructions since each brand is different)
  2. Click the Z-Wave button 3 times quickly (button inside cover by battery)
  3. The new device should appear on your hub's device list
label: ZSE43
overview:
Battery Powered Tilt / Shock sensor

  • Tilt monitoring for garage doors and gates: quick open/close reports you can depend on sent to your Z-Wave system for both vertical and horizontal tilt movement (NOT suitable for swinging gates or doors)
  • Shock sensor: monitor window glass and other surfaces for vibration to improve security of your home
wakeup: Click the Z-Wave button 4 times quickly to wake the sensor up manually. The LED indicator will flash twice to confirm the device is awake. During wake-up, the sensor turns the Z-Wave radio on for one minute to receive communication from the hub.

parameters.label: LED indicator for tilt or shock
parameters.description: Turns the LED indicator for tilt or shock sensor status change on or off.
parameters.overview: Values: 0 – LED won’t blink when either sensor is triggered; 1 – LED blinks only when the shock sensor is triggered; 2 – LED blinks only when the tilt sensor is triggered; 3 – LED blinks when either sensor is triggered (default).

parameters.label: Battery Reporting
parameters.description: Set the threshold for battery reporting.

parameters.label: Battery Reporting - Low
parameters.description: Decide when the sensor should report low battery to the hub.

parameters.label: Shock Sensor Sensitivity
parameters.description: Set the vibration sensor's level of sensitivity.
parameters.overview: Values: 0 – highest level of sensitivity, will report the recorded vibration immediately (default); 1 – medium level of sensitivity, will report only if the vibration is recorded for 1.5 seconds or longer, it will keep reporting vibration for 2 more seconds after the last recorded activity; 2 – lowest level of sensitivity, will report only if the vibration is recorded for 2.5 seconds or longer, it will keep reporting vibration for 3 more seconds after the last recorded activity.

parameters.label: Tilt Sensor Group 2 Association Commands - On Delay
parameters.description: Set the delay for the ON basic set command to be sent to the devices associated in Group 2 after the door is open.

parameters.label: Tilt Sensor Group 2 Association Commands - Off Delay
parameters.description: Set the delay for the OFF basic set command to be sent to the devices associated in Group 2 after the door is closed.

parameters.label: Disable Tilt or Shock Sensor
parameters.description: Disable one of the sensor’s reports if needed
parameters.overview: Values: 0 – only tilt sensor enabled; 1 – only shock sensor enabled; 2 – both sensors enabled (default).

parameters.label: Tilt Sensor Group 2 Association Commands - Commands
parameters.description: Decide what type of Basic Set commands are sent to devices associated in Group 2.
parameters.overview: Values: 0 – all Basic Set commands to Group 2 disabled; 1 – only Basic Set ON commands to Group 2 enabled; 2 – only Basic Set OFF commands to Group 2 enabled; 3 – both Basic Set commands (for on and off) to Group 2 enabled (default).

parameters.label: Shock Sensor Group 3 Association Commands
parameters.description: Decide what type of Basic Set commands are sent to devices associated in Group 3.
parameters.overview: Values: 0 – all Basic Set commands to Group 3 disabled; 1 – only Basic Set ON commands to Group 3 enabled; 2 – only Basic Set OFF commands to Group 3 enabled; 3 – both Basic Set commands (for on and off) to Group 3 enabled (default).

associations.label: Basic set for open / close (tilt sensor)
Basic set for vibration / no vibration (shock sensor)
